name: ApplyVersionToAssemblies
friendlyName: Innofactor DevOps - Apply Build Version to assemblies
description: This task will extract the four part version number from generated the build number and update all AssemblyInfo files in the solution with this version.
author: Innofactor Sweden
helpMarkDown: This task will extract the *four part version number* from generated the {build number} and update all AssemblyInfo files in the solution with this version.
